 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּקָעִים‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[1Kgs.7.24|1Kgs 7:24]]</sup> **plural** ==carved wood or metal ornaments, either ball-, knob-shaped== ([[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>p. 332 f.</sup>) of gourd-shaped (so most; compare following; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flowers*** [Lexicons]); — [[1Kgs.6.18|1Kgs 6:18]]; [[1Kgs.7.24|1Kgs 7:24]] (twice in verse).
